GeneDef.label: construction incapable
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have nomadic instincts that prevents them from creating structures.

GeneDef.label: minor construction instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know how to build structures a little faster than normal to protect themselves from outside dangers.\n\nThis instinct will not help them avoid failure while building, just accelerate the rate that they build.

GeneDef.label: construction instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know how to build structures faster than normal to protect themselves from outside dangers.\n\nThis instinct will not help them avoid failure while building, just accelerate the rate that they build.

GeneDef.label: major construction instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know how to build structures a lot faster than normal to protect themselves from outside dangers.\n\nThis instinct will not help them avoid failure while building, just accelerate the rate that they build.

GeneDef.label: extreme construction instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know how to build structures extremely fast compared to normal to protect themselves from outside dangers.\n\nThis instinct will not help them avoid failure while building, just accelerate the rate that they build.

GeneDef.label: super construction instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know how to build structures super fast compared to normal to protect themselves from outside dangers.\n\nThis instinct will not help them avoid failure while building, just accelerate the rate that they build.

GeneDef.label: hyper construction instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know how to build structures unbelievably fast compared to normal to protect themselves from outside dangers.\n\nThis instinct will not help them avoid failure while building, just accelerate the rate that they build.
